content.prompt:
The writer is considering adding the phrase “for reading that requires intense concentration” to the end of sentence 8 (reproduced below).

Despite these advantages, I discovered that e-readers do not work well.

Should the writer make this addition?

choices.label: Yes, because it appropriately limits the scope of the writer’s claim.
Yes, because it provides a valid counterclaim to the writer’s main idea.
No, because it offers a generalization about reading that is not supported by the passage.
No, because it contradicts the point the writer has made about the advantages of e-readers.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Qualify a claim using modifiers, counterarguments, or alternative perspectives.
